articles.title: Officials Enjoy Concert
articles.content:
Officials Enjoy Concert 
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Officials enjoyed "Concert Celebrating December Holiday" given by the State Merited Chorus at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Dec. 26 and 27.
					 Audience included senior state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, working people's organizations and ministries and servicepersons of the Korean People's Army. Creators, artistes and journalists in the fields of culture, arts and media also enjoyed the concert.
					
					 Colorful performance included numbers like "Comrade Kim Jong Il Is Our Supreme Commander," "Forest Is Swaying" and "Where Are You, Dear General?".
					
					The performers loudly sang of the undying feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who strengthened the Korean People's Army into strong revolutionary army, defending the dignity of Songun Korea and laying a solid foundation for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The concert mesmerized the audience as it reflected the tremendous mental power and the revolutionary stamina of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Lao PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Lao PM
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Thongsing Thammavong upon his holding of the important post of Prime Minister of Laos at the 10th session of the 6th National Assembly of Laos.
					 In the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would as ever expand and develop in the future, too, the message sincerely wished him success in his work for realizing the modernization and industrialization of his country.

articles.title: Constitution Day Observed
articles.content:
Constitution Day Observed
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to the 38th anniversary of the "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" promulgated by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The editorial calls for giving fuller play to the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK and dynamically advancing to achieve the final victory in the drive to build a thriving nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Our socialist homeland is an invincible power built and consolidated under the leadership of the President and the great Party, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The promulgation of the socialist constitution marked a historical event of great significance in the political life of the Korean people and in the efforts to accomplish the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					The President's exploits performed in the nation-building have been firmly preserved and successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that the First Session of the 10th Supreme People's Assembly reorganized the state machinery in the DPRK into the system putting main emphasis on national defence and clarified that the socialist constitution is Kim Il Sung Constitution, reflecting the fresh requirements of the country and developing revolution. This marked a historical event of epochal significance in holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK and successfully realizing his idea and cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has led the work to thoroughly embody the President's last instructions into state building and activities and successfully realize his idea and cause. These exploits of Kim Jong Il were recorded in all pages of his Songun revolutionary history in which he developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea, indicating the road of socialism and consolidating the single-minded unity in every way and building the DPRK into a rich and prosperous country under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership the DPRK is shedding its rays as a socialist land of bliss where the President's desire for building a thriving nation is becoming a reality.
					
					 The socialist cause of the DPRK is sure to triumph as long as there are the seasoned and tested leadership of the great WPK, the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people around the headquarters of the revolution and the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Urged to Immediately Discontinue Military Provocations
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Urged to Immediately Discontinue Military Provocations
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean trigger-happy elements should not misjudge the will of the DPRK to preserve peace but immediately stop their reckless military provocations aimed at screwing up the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article, and goes on:
					
					 A madcap shelling exercise staged by the puppet forces in the waters off Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea on Dec. 20, naval maneuvers conducted by a puppet navy fleet in the East Sea of Korea in its wake and the large-scale joint firing exercises staged by the puppet ground and air forces of south Korea in the central sector of the front, etc. were the products of the dangerous collusion between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities seek a way out of their ever-deepening ruling crisis in boosting cooperation with the U.S. and escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 They consider this as leverage for getting rid of the crisis and confusion and staying in power. They orchestrated the Yonphyong Island shelling incident to achieve this purpose. 
					
					 By perpetrating military provocations one after another in the West Sea of Korea the south Korean puppet forces sought to divert elsewhere the south Korean people's attention and realize their wild ambition to invade the DPRK.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. that egged those forces on to spark off the above-said shelling incident and escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is keen on increasing the tension on the peninsula, opposed to any process to preserve peace on it. This is designed to save its policy towards Asia and its strategy towards the DPRK from their repeated failures and retain its supremacy over the region.
					
					 Armed clashes have not occurred in the West Sea of Korea despite the dangerous collusion between the U.S. and south Korean war-like forces aimed at provoking a war of aggression against the DPRK. This is entirely thanks to the pluck, the self-restraint and steadfast will of the DPRK to preserve peace.
					
					 But there is a limit to its patience, too.
					
					 The puppet regime of south Korea is so despicable and coward that it cannot maintain its power even a moment without the protection of its American master. Its desperate efforts to do harm to the DPRK in reliance on this master would only precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Naval Firing Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Naval Firing Exercises
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea plans to stage provocative naval firing exercises in the East, West and South Seas of Korea from Dec. 27 to 31, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The madcap naval firing exercises to be staged by the puppet war-like forces again in 23 places with huge forces involved will drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war as they are aimed at invading the DPRK.

articles.title: Suppression of Reunification Movement under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Reunification Movement under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) called a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 24 in protest against the puppet security authorities' suppression of leading members of the organization.
					A press release read out at the conference accused the security authorities of issuing summons to the chairman and the secretary general of the organization several times on charges of violation of the "National Security Law."
					
					It said that the security authorities took this action against them on groundless charges that the organization published a commentary on the Yonphyong Island shelling incident and praised and encouraged the north through the event held to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon.
					
					The press release charged that the action taken against members of the legitimate organization who have struggled to achieve the independent reunification of the country and implement the June 15 joint declaration was an unpardonable act against the nation and reunification.
					
					It urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to halt at once the crackdown upon the reunification movement organizations.

articles.title: Lecture on Situation of Korean Peninsula Given in Peru
articles.content:
Lecture on Situation of Korean Peninsula Given in Peru
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A lecture on the situation of the Korean Peninsula was given in Peru on Dec. 18.
					The lecturer briefed the participants on the successes made by the Korean people this year in the efforts to build a thriving nation and on the situation that grew extremely tense on the peninsula due to the "Cheonan" warship case and the Yonphyong Island shelling incident.
					
					Victor Oliva Miguel, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, said his party, as a signatory to the Pyongyang Declaration, would invariably stand firm by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to defend socialism and reunify the country.
					
					The struggle of the WPK and the Korean people is instilling confidence, courage and hope into the RSPP in its efforts to build socialism in Peru, he said, adding the DPRK serves as a beacon of hope for the world progressive people. 
					
					He said that the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the most just political mode which helps defend the sovereignty of the country, adhere to the principle of independence in the political, economic, military and all other fields and speed up the construction of a thriving nation.
					
					The DPRK imbues all the progressive people with pride, drawing the biggest global attention, he noted.

articles.title: DPRK's Anniversaries Observed in Czech Republic
articles.content:
DPRK's Anniversaries Observed in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea released a joint bulletin on Dec. 21 to mark the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					The bulletin carried articles under "The Supreme Commander and Soldiers", "Kim Jong Suk and Her Feats Performed in the History of Building the Army of the DPRK” and other titles.
					
					In the articles the bulletin gave a detailed account of the facts that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the politico-ideological and military positions of the DPRK have been reinforced in every way and a landmark phase has been brought about in building a great and prosperous powerful nation.
					
					The bulletin related stories about the warm loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for soldiers while making ceaseless inspections of KPA units.
					
					Recalling that Kim Jong Suk made a great contribution to building regular armed forces true to President Kim Il Sung's line of building the army, it noted, adding her feats will remain long with prosperous socialist Korea and the invincible KPA.

articles.title: DPRK's Anniversaries Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Anniversaries Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Italy and Norway, a lecture in Sweden and round-table talks, photo exhibition and film show in Iran between Dec. 17 and 20 to mark the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 Displayed at the exhibition were photos on the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Korean film shown was "Reply of Korea." 
					
					 Osvaldo Pesce, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, said that the politico-ideological position of the DPRK has been reinforced in every way and its military position has become as strong as an invulnerable fortress thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Svend Haakon Jacobsen, chairman of the Communist Party of Norway, said that the recent events held in the Korean Peninsula proved once again the invincibility of the Songun politics. And he praised the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The immortal feats of Kim Jong Suk will always be remembered by the Korean and all other progressive people of the world, he added. 
					
					 Eric Andersson, international secretary of the Communist Party of Sweden, said the DPRK would demonstrate its might as an invincible power under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Norway.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Revolutionary Comradeship Is the Foundation of the Single-minded Unity and an Engine of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia. 
					 The work published on April 7, Juche 93 (2004) clarifies the essence of the revolutionary comradeship and the reason why it serves as a foundation of the single-minded unity and an engine of the revolution. 
					
					 The work indicates tasks for turning the whole society into one based on comradeship under the uplifted slogan of comradeship.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il disfruta la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il disfruta la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio el "concierto de diciembre" del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					  Respondiendo cordialmente a la efusiva aclamacion de los espectadores, el Dirigente felicito calidamente a ellos que en acato a la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, luchan abnegadamente por defender y prosperar la patria socialista.
					
					  En la escena se presentaron diversas piezas como el coro masculino "Camarada Kim Jong Il es nuestro Comandante Supremo", el solo femenino y coro masculino "Volveremos sin falta con el General", el solo y coro masculinos "?Donde esta el querido General?".
					
					  El Dirigente aprecio altamente la exitosa funcion y agradecio a todos los creadores y artistas mostrandose muy complacido de que esa entidad artistica haya ofrecido este magnifico concierto de alto nivel ideo-artistico en que aletean la conviccion y voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					  Volvio a reconocer los meritos de los artistas del Coro destacando que durante 15 anos pasados desde el primer concierto, ellos cumplieron magnificamente su sagrada mision de trompeteros de la era del Songun al infundir en todos los militares y civiles el calido amor por el partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo, la conviccion y voluntad indoblegables interpretando como tronada los himnos militares revolucionarios.
					
					  Finalmente, el Dirigente se fotografio con los artistas del Coro.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del CDN y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico (BP) y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, U Tong Chuk, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y miembro de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol y Yun Jong Rin, miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN, y los comandantes del ejercito, los cuadros directivos civiles, los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Entidad surcoreana condena represion de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Entidad surcoreana condena represion de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En una entrevista de prensa concedida el dia 24 en Seul, La Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) condeno la represion violenta de las autoridades titeres de seguridad publica contra sus miembros medulares.
					La nota leida en la ocasion senala que las autoridades de seguridad emitieron el comparendo en varias ocasiones al presidente y al secretario general de dicha entidad acusandolos de violacion de la "Ley de Seguridad".
					
					Continua que ellas actuan de esa manera cuestionando el comentario de la entidad publicado en relacion con el fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong e imputando que ella elogio y estimulo al Norte (de Corea) mediante al acto conmemorativo del vigesimo aniversario de la fundacion de la APRP.
					
					Califica tal represion a los miembros de esa entidad legitima, que vino luchando por la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, de imperdonable crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion.
					
					Por ultimo, la nota exige al "poder" de Lee Myung Bak que cese inmediatamente la represion sobre las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora el dia de la Constitucion Socialista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora el dia de la Constitucion Socialista
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En el editorial publicado en homenaje al 38o aniversario de la promulgacion de la "Constitucion Socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el diario Rodong Sinmun llamo a poner en pleno juego la superioridad del regimen socialista coreano y a luchar con mas vigor por alcanzar la victoria final de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera siguiendo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Nuestra patria socialista es la invencible potencia fundada y fortalecida por el gran Lider y el gran partido, comienza el editorial y continua:
					
					  La promulgacion de la Constitucion Socialista por el Presidente Kim Il Sung fue un evento historico de gran importancia en la vida politica del pueblo coreano y en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista del Juche.
					
					  Las hazanas del Presidente realizadas en la construccion del Estado se defienden firmemente y continuan con brillantez gracias al Dirigente      Kim Jong Il.
					
					  En reflejo de la nueva demanda de la patria y la revolucion en desarrollo, el Dirigente reestructuro en el primer periodo de sesiones de la 10a legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema el sistema estatal de Corea centrandolo en la defensa nacional y declaro la Constitucion Socialista como la de       Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Este evento historico tuvo una importancia trascendental para enaltecer al gran Lider           Kim Il Sung como eterno Presidente de la RPDC y cumplir satisfactoriamente su idea y causa.
					
					  Las hazanas del Dirigente realizadas en su guia para materializar cabalmente el legado del Presidente en la construccion y las actividades del Estado y realizar brillantemente su idea y la causa del segundo estan anotadas en las paginas de la historia de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					　En el curso de esta, el Dirigente ha iluminado el camino del socialismo profundizando la idea Juche, la del Songun, y condujo a nuestra patria a la prosperidad al consolidar extraordinariamente la unidad monolitica bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					  Gracias a la orientacion del Songun del Dirigente, nuestra patria se transforma hoy como paraiso socialista en que se hace realidad el anhelo del Presidente de construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Triunfara sin falta la causa socialista del pueblo coreano mientras haya la direccion del probado y diestro PTC, la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y el pueblo, unidos firmemente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion, y el invencible ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Entidades checas editan boletin por efemerides coreanas
articles.content:
Entidades checas editan boletin por efemerides coreanas
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 19o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del 93o de natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, la Asociacion de Amistad Checo-Corea Paektusan y el Grupo Checo del Estudio y la Materializacion de la Idea Juche publicaron en conjunto el dia 21 un boletin.
					El boletin contiene varios articulos de distintos titulos como "Comandante Supremo y soldados", "Kim Jong Suk y sus hazanas registradas en la historia de construccion del ejercito coreano", etc.
					
					Senala detalladamente que bajo la guia del Songun del Dirigente, se fortalecieron por todos los medios, la trinchera ideo-politica y la militar de Corea y se dio la coyuntura trascendental para la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Transmite citando hechos que el Dirigente dispenso gran amor y benevolencia para los soldados durante su incesante inspeccion sobre el EPC.
					
					Se refiere a que la Heroina contribuyo mucho a la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares segun la linea del Presidente Kim Il Sung sobre esta materia y destaca que las proezas de ella brillaran eternamente con la Corea socialista en prosperidad y el invencible EPC.
